attributes.action: let us vote Joanna Lumley in as Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna Lumley - talks sense, believes in this country and has a passionate sense of what is right and what is wrong. This is far more important than any other skill required of a politician, and sadly seems to be lacking in the current government and other would-be governments.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
